name: vsts-chef-task-exec-inspec
description: Execute InSpec on machines in a Deployment Group
author: Chef

inputs.name: inspecProfilePath
inputs.label: Profile Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the InSpec profiles that need to be executed

inputs.name: inspecArguments
inputs.label: InSpec Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments that should be passed to `inspec exec`. By default this is all profiles in the directory.

inputs.name: inspecResultsFile
inputs.label: InSpec Results File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file that results should be written to. If not an absolute path this will be relative to the specified Profile Path
